thread.title: BRIEF-China Internet Nationwide Financial Says Independent Committee Completed Investigation Into Allegations In Muddy Waters Report

title: BRIEF-China Internet Nationwide Financial Says Independent Committee Completed Investigation Into Allegations In Muddy Waters Report

organizations.name: brief-china internet nationwide financial says independent committee
china internet nationwide financial services inc
committee completed investigation into allegations in muddy waters report reuters

text:
April 30, 2018 / 12:51 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-China Internet Nationwide Financial Says Independent Committee Completed Investigation Into Allegations In Muddy Waters Report Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
April 30 (Reuters) - China Internet Nationwide Financial Services Inc:
* CHINA INTERNET NATIONWIDE FINANCIAL- INDEPENDENT COMMITTEE COMPLETED INVESTIGATION INTO ALLEGATIONS RAISED IN MUDDY WATERS REPORT DATED DEC 20, 2017
* CHINA INTERNET NATIONWIDE FINANCIAL-INVESTIGATION FOUND NO MATERIAL INCONSISTENCY BETWEEN GROSS REVENUE IN COâ€™S BOOKS & RECORDS & REVENUE REPORTED IN SEC REPORTS
* CHINA INTERNET NATIONWIDE FINANCIAL - INVESTIGATION FOUND ACQUISITION OF BEIJING ANYTRUST SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY CO. LTD WAS A "VALID TRANSACTION" Source text: [ prn.to/2HCshez ] Further company coverage:
